product_name: The North Face Ventana Full-Zip Jacket - Women's
long_description: The North Face Ventana Full-Zip top keeps you dry and comfortable while you're moving fast. Lightweight, hard-face stretch fleece features FlashDry(TM) fibers that regulate body temperature. Quick-drying, moisture-wicking polyester fabric with FlashDry(TM) fibers dramatically improve the fabric's dry time and breathability and won't wash out. Crushed coconut shells and crushed volcanic rock particles in FlashDry fabric also resist odors; exterior face resists pilling. Lightweight stretch panels under arms and at the front and rear shoulders add breathability, enhance movement and decrease bulk. 2 zip pockets. Thumbholes and flatlock seams enhance your comfort when wearing The North Face Ventana Full-Zip top.
short_description: The North Face Ventana Full-Zip top keeps you dry and comfortable while you're moving fast. Lightweight, hard-face stretch fleece features FlashDry(TM) fibers that regulate body temperature.
